Scheduling Appointments

Career Preparation Mentoring appointments are conducted at several locations on campus.

You can schedule your own career preparation mentoring appointments online by doing one of the following:

Log into your my.byui.edu account. Select the 'Services' tab and then select 'Career Prep Mentor Scheduler' in the 'Related Links' column.

OR

Log into Career Navigator by selecting 'Schedule a Resume Review/Practice Interview a Career Mentor' link under the 'quicklinks' column.

Click here for detailed instructions for scheduling an in-person mentoring appointment
